languages.text: "Мон-кай злятся, когда не получают ответа. И когда получают — тоже злятся". {n}Ирлиэт отстраняется и более не смотрит в вашу сторону.{/n} "Давай оставим сей разговор в прошлом — и двинемся дальше".

"Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай злятся, когда не получают ответа. И когда получают — тоже злятся". {n}Ирлиэт отстраняется и более не смотрит в вашу сторону.{/n} "Давай оставим сей разговор в прошлом — и двинемся дальше".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

"Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

"Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

"Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh se enfurecen cuando no reciben una respuesta. Y cuando sí la reciben, se enfurecen igual». {n}Yrliet da un paso atrás y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Dejemos esta conversación en el pasado y sigamos adelante».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh se enfurecen cuando no reciben una respuesta. Y cuando sí la reciben, se enfurecen igual». {n}Yrliet da un paso atrás y aparta la mirada.{/n} «Dejemos esta conversación en el pasado y sigamos adelante».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは答えが返ってこないと怒る。そして、いざ答えを知ると、またそこで怒る」{n}ユリエットは後退り、あなたから視線をそらす。{/n}「この話は過去のものとして、次に移ろう」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは答えが返ってこないと怒る。そして、いざ答えを知ると、またそこで怒る」{n}ユリエットは後退り、あなたから視線をそらす。{/n}「この話は過去のものとして、次に移ろう」

languages.text: “得不到答案的猴子会生气，可即使得到答案，猴子还是会生气。”{n}伊莉耶特从你身边退开一步，别开目光。{/n}“就当我们从来没聊过这些话吧。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: “得不到答案的猴子会生气，可即使得到答案，猴子还是会生气。”{n}伊莉耶特从你身边退开一步，别开目光。{/n}“就当我们从来没聊过这些话吧。”

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh se fâchent lorsqu'ils ne reçoivent pas de réponse et ils se fâchent tout autant lorsqu'ils en obtiennent une. » {n}Yrliet recule et détourne le regard.{/n} « Laissons cette conversation derrière nous et tournons la page. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh se fâchent lorsqu'ils ne reçoivent pas de réponse et ils se fâchent tout autant lorsqu'ils en obtiennent une. » {n}Yrliet recule et détourne le regard.{/n} « Laissons cette conversation derrière nous et tournons la page. »

languages.text: "Chem-Pan-Sey werden wütend, wenn sie keine Antwort erhalten. Und wenn sie eine Antwort erhalten, werden sie auch wütend." {n}Yrliet tritt einen Schritt zurück und blickt weg von dir.{/n} "Lassen wir diese Unterhaltung in der Vergangenheit und blicken nach vorn."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: "Chem-Pan-Sey werden wütend, wenn sie keine Antwort erhalten. Und wenn sie eine Antwort erhalten, werden sie auch wütend." {n}Yrliet tritt einen Schritt zurück und blickt weg von dir.{/n} "Lassen wir diese Unterhaltung in der Vergangenheit und blicken nach vorn."

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, cevap alamadığında sinirleniyor. Cevap aldıklarında da sinirleniyorlar." {n}Yrliet, geri geri adım atıp uzaklara bakıyor.{/n} "Bu muhabbetimizi geride bırakıp hayatlarımıza devam edelim."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh grow angry when they do not receive an answer. And when they do receive an answer, they grow angry then, too." {n}Yrliet steps back and looks away from you.{/n} "Let us leave this conversation in the past, and move on."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler cevap alamadığında sinirleniyor. Cevap aldıklarında da sinirleniyorlar." {n}Yrliet geri geri adım atıp uzaklara bakıyor.{/n} "Bu muhabbetimizi geride bırakıp hayatlarımıza devam edelim."
